pr_title: [freebox] Adding Fiber optic and support of Delta bridge

timeline.message:
Adding Delta / Fiber optic capability to Freebox binding

Signed-off-by: Gaël L'hopital <glhopital@gmail.com>

Correction of indentation

Signed-off-by: Gaël L'hopital <glhopital@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This will return "true" or "false" as string.
Why not producing a more convenient string status, maybe something similar to the xDSL status ?
Or return boolean and use a Switch channel rather than a String channel ?
You consider the field sfp_present but are we sure that the other fields like sfp_has_signal or link are not better candidates ? (unfortunately the API is not documented !)
timeline.author: lolodomo

replies.bodyText: This was more intended to introduce a quick running solution to solve F.O. issue. I plan a wider review later on this binding to introduce other field and switch to UoM
replies.author: clinique

timeline.bodyText:
Why not using boolean rather than Boolean ?
Same for other Boolean fields.
timeline.author: lolodomo

+ * @author Gaël L'hopital - Initial contribution
+ */

timeline.bodyText:
Could you please use standard naming, getSfpPresent rather than getSfp_present ?
Same for the other getter methods.
timeline.author: lolodomo

timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: Please update the return type from Boolean to boolean

timeline.bodyText: Please update the return type from Boolean to boolean

replies.bodyText:
This is a very old binding without nullness annotations.
And the class you point  is an object for JSON mapping, The nonnull annotation is not very appropriate for such case.
replies.author: lolodomo

timeline.message:
Code review corrections

Signed-off-by: Gaël L'hopital <gael@lhopital.org>
